messages.title: Keith Nevols Leading the fight against the Conservatives' hard Brexit
messages.content: "The election on June 8 is your chance to change Britain."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people. Schools in Sittingbourne and Sheppey are set to lose over £5m from their budgets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Since the referendum, the Lib Dems have gained seats from Labour, UKIP and the Conservatives in by-elections up and down the country.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
issues.health: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.

community.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people. Schools in Sittingbourne and Sheppey are set to lose over £5m from their budgets.

contactInformation.address: Smith Nevols, Liberal Democrats, 7 Trinity Road, Sittingbourne, Kent ME10 3EL.

quotes.text: "The election on June 8 is your chance to change Britain."
